Table of Contents

Using LipSync Clips

LipSync clips allow you to convert dialogue audio into mouth-shape animation data automatically.

Prerequsites

FaceToons LipSync Clip utilizes Rhubarb, an open-source MIT tool for recognizing mouth-shapes from audio files.

  1. Download the most recent Rhubarb for your system here
  2. Extract it to any folder on your system
  3. Navigate to your Unity Editor Preferences Edit > Preferences > Gasimo > FaceToons > Rhubarb LipSync
  4. Set the Rhubarb Path to the extracted Rhubarb Binary.

Using Rhubarb LipSync

  1. Create LipSync Clip
  2. Assign Audio
  3. Open LipSync Baker
  4. If you have a transcript for the audio, tick the Dialogue field and enter transcript there. Optionally select whether Extended Mouth Shapes should be used.
  5. Press the Bake Button.
